channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Telecom Paris on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Activation Map Compression through Tensor Decomposition for Deep Learning
item.description: Slash deep learning’s memory footprint! This paper introduces a novel activation map compression technique via tensor decomposition, significantly boosting on-device training efficiency for edge AI.

item.title: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning: Overcoming limitations of Winner-takes-all with annealing
item.description: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning (aMCL) overcomes limitations of Winner-takes-all in multiple choice learning by using annealing, improving robustness and performance.

item.title: Continuous Product Graph Neural Networks
item.description: CITRUS: a novel continuous graph neural network efficiently processes multidomain data on multiple graphs, achieving superior performance in spatiotemporal forecasting.
